resources.string: Talk for a full 60 seconds about your day while creatively integrating the given four words into your speech
After given a category you will have “5” seconds to name 3 things related to that category. The catch is you can’t hesitate!
Rant, persuade, gossip, argue, complain, spill your feelings out, improvise or casually talk about anything you want for a full minute and get to know your speaking habits.
Repeat the prompt correctly, the quicker you can repeat it, the higher the score. Make sure to announciate!
